title: PyTorch crashes at import on Ubuntu 14.10 when compiled from source
body_html:
I installed PyTorch from sources using fresh Miniconda.

python3 -c 'import torch'
Floating point exception (core dumped)

gdb stack-trace:

Program received signal SIGFPE, Arithmetic exception.
std::__detail::_Map_base<std::string, std::pair<std::string const, std::string>, std::allocator<std::pair<std::string const, std::string> >, std::__detail::_Select1st, std::equal_to<std::string>, std::hash<std::string>, std::__detail::_Mod_range_hashing, std::__detail::_Default_ranged_hash, std::__detail::_Prime_rehash_policy, std::__detail::_Hashtable_traits<true, false, true>, true>::operator[] (this=0x5555561aace8, __k=...) at /usr/include/c++/4.9/bits/hashtable_policy.h:596
596           std::size_t __n = __h->_M_bucket_index(__k, __code);
(gdb) bt
#0  std::__detail::_Map_base<std::string, std::pair<std::string const, std::string>, std::allocator<std::pair<std::string const, std::string> >, std::__detail::_Select1st, std::equal_to<std::string>, std::hash<std::string>, std::__detail::_Mod_range_hashing, std::__detail::_Default_ranged_hash, std::__detail::_Prime_rehash_policy, std::__detail::_Hashtable_traits<true, false, true>, true>::operator[] (this=0x5555561aace8, __k=...) at /usr/include/c++/4.9/bits/hashtable_policy.h:596
#1  0x00007fffe41e3603 in operator[] (__k=..., this=0x5555561aace8) at /usr/include/c++/4.9/bits/unordered_map.h:627
#2  Register (help_msg=..., creator=..., key=..., this=0x5555561aacb0) at /media/sdb/kantorov/raclette/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen/Registry.h:71
#3  Registerer (this=<optimized out>, help_msg=..., creator=..., registry=0x5555561aacb0, key=...)
    at /media/sdb/kantorov/raclette/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen/Registry.h:124
#4  __static_initialization_and_destruction_0 (__initialize_p=1, __priority=65535) at torch/csrc/autograd/aten_variable_hooks.cpp:15
#5  _GLOBAL__sub_I_aten_variable_hooks.cpp(void) () at torch/csrc/autograd/aten_variable_hooks.cpp:23
#6  0x00007ffff7dea13a in call_init (l=<optimized out>, argc=argc@entry=3, argv=argv@entry=0x7fffffffdf88, env=env@entry=0x555555ab1ab0) at dl-init.c:78
#7  0x00007ffff7dea223 in call_init (env=<optimized out>, argv=<optimized out>, argc=<optimized out>, l=<optimized out>) at dl-init.c:36
#8  _dl_init (main_map=main_map@entry=0x555555ee6c10, argc=3, argv=0x7fffffffdf88, env=0x555555ab1ab0) at dl-init.c:126
#9  0x00007ffff7deec6e in dl_open_worker (a=a@entry=0x7fffffffb8c8) at dl-open.c:577
#10 0x00007ffff7de9ff4 in _dl_catch_error (objname=objname@entry=0x7fffffffb8b8, errstring=errstring@entry=0x7fffffffb8c0, mallocedp=mallocedp@entry=0x7fffffffb8b0,
    operate=operate@entry=0x7ffff7dee990 <dl_open_worker>, args=args@entry=0x7fffffffb8c8) at dl-error.c:187
#11 0x00007ffff7dee3ab in _dl_open (file=0x7fffea4d7ea8 "/media/sdb/kantorov/raclette/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so", mode=-2147483391,
    caller_dlopen=<optimized out>, nsid=-2, argc=3, argv=0x7fffffffdf88, env=0x555555ab1ab0) at dl-open.c:661
#12 0x00007ffff75f502b in dlopen_doit (a=a@entry=0x7fffffffbae0) at dlopen.c:66
#13 0x00007ffff7de9ff4 in _dl_catch_error (objname=0x555555ae3860, errstring=0x555555ae3868, mallocedp=0x555555ae3858, operate=0x7ffff75f4fd0 <dlopen_doit>, args=0x7fffffffbae0)
    at dl-error.c:187
#14 0x00007ffff75f562d in _dlerror_run (operate=operate@entry=0x7ffff75f4fd0 <dlopen_doit>, args=args@entry=0x7fffffffbae0) at dlerror.c:163
#15 0x00007ffff75f50c1 in __dlopen (file=<optimized out>, mode=<optimized out>) at dlopen.c:87
#16 0x0000555555742bfa in _PyImport_FindSharedFuncptr ()

ubuntu 14.10
cuda 8.0
gcc 4.9.1
python 3.6.5
body_text:
I installed PyTorch from sources using fresh Miniconda.
python3 -c 'import torch'
Floating point exception (core dumped)

gdb stack-trace:
Program received signal SIGFPE, Arithmetic exception.
std::__detail::_Map_base<std::string, std::pair<std::string const, std::string>, std::allocator<std::pair<std::string const, std::string> >, std::__detail::_Select1st, std::equal_to<std::string>, std::hash<std::string>, std::__detail::_Mod_range_hashing, std::__detail::_Default_ranged_hash, std::__detail::_Prime_rehash_policy, std::__detail::_Hashtable_traits<true, false, true>, true>::operator[] (this=0x5555561aace8, __k=...) at /usr/include/c++/4.9/bits/hashtable_policy.h:596
596           std::size_t __n = __h->_M_bucket_index(__k, __code);
(gdb) bt

#3  Registerer (this=<optimized out>, help_msg=..., creator=..., registry=0x5555561aacb0, key=...)

#10 0x00007ffff7de9ff4 in _dl_catch_error (objname=objname@entry=0x7fffffffb8b8, errstring=errstring@entry=0x7fffffffb8c0, mallocedp=mallocedp@entry=0x7fffffffb8b0,
    operate=operate@entry=0x7ffff7dee990 <dl_open_worker>, args=args@entry=0x7fffffffb8c8) at dl-error.c:187
#11 0x00007ffff7dee3ab in _dl_open (file=0x7fffea4d7ea8 "/media/sdb/kantorov/raclette/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so", mode=-2147483391,
    caller_dlopen=<optimized out>, nsid=-2, argc=3, argv=0x7fffffffdf88, env=0x555555ab1ab0) at dl-open.c:661

body:
I installed PyTorch from sources using fresh Miniconda.

```
python3 -c 'import torch'
Floating point exception (core dumped)
```

gdb stack-trace:
```
Program received signal SIGFPE, Arithmetic exception.
std::__detail::_Map_base<std::string, std::pair<std::string const, std::string>, std::allocator<std::pair<std::string const, std::string> >, std::__detail::_Select1st, std::equal_to<std::string>, std::hash<std::string>, std::__detail::_Mod_range_hashing, std::__detail::_Default_ranged_hash, std::__detail::_Prime_rehash_policy, std::__detail::_Hashtable_traits<true, false, true>, true>::operator[] (this=0x5555561aace8, __k=...) at /usr/include/c++/4.9/bits/hashtable_policy.h:596
596           std::size_t __n = __h->_M_bucket_index(__k, __code);
(gdb) bt
#0  std::__detail::_Map_base<std::string, std::pair<std::string const, std::string>, std::allocator<std::pair<std::string const, std::string> >, std::__detail::_Select1st, std::equal_to<std::string>, std::hash<std::string>, std::__detail::_Mod_range_hashing, std::__detail::_Default_ranged_hash, std::__detail::_Prime_rehash_policy, std::__detail::_Hashtable_traits<true, false, true>, true>::operator[] (this=0x5555561aace8, __k=...) at /usr/include/c++/4.9/bits/hashtable_policy.h:596

#2  Register (help_msg=..., creator=..., key=..., this=0x5555561aacb0) at /media/sdb/kantorov/raclette/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen/Registry.h:71
#3  Registerer (this=<optimized out>, help_msg=..., creator=..., registry=0x5555561aacb0, key=...)
    at /media/sdb/kantorov/raclette/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen/Registry.h:124
#4  __static_initialization_and_destruction_0 (__initialize_p=1, __priority=65535) at torch/csrc/autograd/aten_variable_hooks.cpp:15
#5  _GLOBAL__sub_I_aten_variable_hooks.cpp(void) () at torch/csrc/autograd/aten_variable_hooks.cpp:23
#6  0x00007ffff7dea13a in call_init (l=<optimized out>, argc=argc@entry=3, argv=argv@entry=0x7fffffffdf88, env=env@entry=0x555555ab1ab0) at dl-init.c:78

#10 0x00007ffff7de9ff4 in _dl_catch_error (objname=objname@entry=0x7fffffffb8b8, errstring=errstring@entry=0x7fffffffb8c0, mallocedp=mallocedp@entry=0x7fffffffb8b0,
    operate=operate@entry=0x7ffff7dee990 <dl_open_worker>, args=args@entry=0x7fffffffb8c8) at dl-error.c:187
#11 0x00007ffff7dee3ab in _dl_open (file=0x7fffea4d7ea8 "/media/sdb/kantorov/raclette/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so", mode=-2147483391,
    caller_dlopen=<optimized out>, nsid=-2, argc=3, argv=0x7fffffffdf88, env=0x555555ab1ab0) at dl-open.c:661
#12 0x00007ffff75f502b in dlopen_doit (a=a@entry=0x7fffffffbae0) at dlopen.c:66

    at dl-error.c:187
#14 0x00007ffff75f562d in _dlerror_run (operate=operate@entry=0x7ffff75f4fd0 <dlopen_doit>, args=args@entry=0x7fffffffbae0) at dlerror.c:163
```
